Vantungmi sak theihloh sisan manphatna la
Vantung kham khua sung ah zong hih la kasa ding hi

title: Gupna Bukim
encoded:
Galhiam 4, ကြွယ်ဝသောအသက်သာ

  • Gupna bukim ong pia Jehovah Pasian
    Dikna tawh hong tuam Jehovah Tsidkenu
    Hong ompih tawntung Jehovah Shamah
    Lungnopna Jehovah Shalom

Hong hausak hi
Ka sapna teng hong sik Jehovah Jireh
Hong damsak Pasian Jehovah Rapha
Ama min ading thuman lampi ah
Hong kha Jehovah Ra-ah
Gualzawhna hong pia
Ka Topa Jehovah Nissi

  • Topa'n hiteh hong cih leh hipah hiteh
    Topa'n neiteh hong cih leh a nei hiteh
    Topa'n bawlthei hong cih leh hi pah hi
    Vangliatna khempeuh hong pia zo

Hong hausak hi

Hong damsak Pasian Jehovah Rapha
Ama min ading thuman lampi ah

Ka Topa Jehovah Nissi

  • Topa'n damteh hong cih leh a dam hi teh
    Topa'n hauteh hong cih leh a hau hi teh
    Sihding natding lau na pan hong gum hi

Hong hausak hi
Ka sapna teng hong sik Jehovah Jireh

title: Na Theihloh Man Hizaw
encoded:
Galhiam 1

  • Hongit Topa Zeisu nuntak tawntungna hi,
    Hehpihna leh itna tawh kidim hi
    Lungdam in la kasa lungmuang in ka omta
    Ka khamuanna ka Topa Zeisu hi

Hong itna thei lecin, Hong ngaihna thei lecin
Nang zong sang nuamlo in om kei niteh
Na theihloh man hizaw, Na telloh man hizaw
Endihve na kha a ding hilo maw

  • Sanggam aw hih leitung a ding bang na geel hiam?
    Na khantawn a ding zong na geel ngei hiam?
    Ki sathei kha kei in, na khangdawng hoih lai in
    Tuate paak bang vul ding na phawk thei hiam?

Hong itna thei lecin, Hong ngaihna thei lecin
Nang zong sang nuamlo in om kei niteh
Na theihloh man hizaw, Na telloh man hizaw
Endihve na kha a ding hilo maw

  • A ki muhtheih lai in, a hong nai om lai in
    Hong tung ding na zon hang na muhloh hun
    Hong tunma tumah in, Amah nial nawn kei in!
    Endihve na kha a ding in hong kun

Hong itna thei lecin, Hong ngaihna thei lecin

title: III. Mopawi/ Kiteenna
encoded:
Galhiam 358-360

Theisakna: Laisiangtho munte pen Galhiam Labu sung pan a ki la hi in, Laisiangtho version pen bible.com a Tedim Bible pan hi. Labu sung a a laimal tawh ki banglo  thei ding a,ahih hang a khiatna a kibang mah hi. 

1."Zi pi unla tanu tapa nei un. Na tapate a’ ding mo la unla, na tanute uh mo kha un; tua hileh amau in zong tanu tapa hong nei ding uh hi. Kiam kei unla, pungzaw un."-‭‭JEREMIAH‬ ‭29:6‬‬

2. "Mi khempeuh in nupa thu thupi ngaihsut uh hen la, zite pen pasalte tungah citakin, pasalte zong a zite uh tungah citak uh hen. Pasian in a thangtat mite le nulepa mawhna a gamta mite tungah thu khen ding hi." -‭‭HEBRU‬ ‭13:4‬‬

3. "Tua ahih manin amaute nih hi nawn loin khat ahi ta uh hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in a gawmsa mite, kuamah in khen kei ta hen,” ci-in a dawng hi." -‭‭MATTHAI‬ ‭19:6‬‬

4. "Tua thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm a, amau tegel pum khat a bang uh hi." -‭‭PIANCILNA‬ ‭2:24‬‬

5. "Inn le neihsate pen pate’ tung panin a kiluah hi a, zi pil ahihleh Topa bek in hong pia thei hi."-‭‭PAUNAK‬ ‭19:14‬‬

6. "Zi hoih pen a pasal’ minthanna le lungdamna hi a, a pasal a maizumsak zi pen a pasal a dingin a dam thei lo guhnatna tawh kibang hi." -‭‭PAUNAK‬ ‭12:4‬‬

7. "Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “Mipa amah guak a om ding hoih lo hi. Ama a’ ding a kituak a huh ding ka bawlsak ding hi,” ci hi."-‭‭PIANCILNA‬ ‭2:18‬‬

8. "Zite aw, Topa’ thu na man’ uh mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un." -‭‭EFESA‬ ‭5:22‬‬

9. "Tua ahih ciangin na zi tawh lungkim inla, na tenpih numei tawh lungdam in."A it-huai a ngaihbaangin ngaihsun tawntung inla, ama ngaihbaanna tawh lungdamin, ama hong itna tawh lungkim in." -‭‭PAUNAK‬ ‭5:18-19‬‬

10. "Zi a muzote na hoih a mu hi a, Topa’ maipha a ngah ahi hi." -‭‭PAUNAK‬ ‭18:22‬‬

11. "Pasian in na zite uh tawh pumkhat, lungsim khat ahi dingin hong bawl hi lo ahi hiam? Hih bangin a hong bawlna pen bang a deihna ahi hiam? Pasian’ mi taktak ahi ding tate i neih theih nading ahi hi. Tua ahih manin na khangno lai-un na tenpih na zi uh tawh na thuciamna uh na palsatkhak loh nadingun kidawm un."-‭‭MALAKHI‬ ‭2:15‬‬

12."Tua mah bangin zite aw, na pasalte uh Pasian thu um lo ahihkhak leh na gamtatna hangun Pasian thu a uptheih nadingun na pasalte uh thu na mang un. Kampau kul sese loin,na gamtat hoihna uh a muh uh ciangin Pasian thu hong um ding uh hi. "Na hoih nadingun puatham kizepna ahi sambawlna, kham le suangmanpha tawh kizepna, puan hoihnono silhnate na bulphuh kei unla, "Pasian’ muhna-ah a manpha mahmah ahi lungsim puakzia, a tul thei lo sunglam hoihna na bulphuh zaw un. A beisa hunah Pasian muangin thu um numeite in a pasalte uh thu mangin, tu-a bang danin a hoih nadingun a kibawl uh hi. Sarah zong tu-a bangmahin gamta a, a pasal Abraham’ thu mangin, “Topa aw,” a ci hi. Note zong a hoihin gamta-in, bangmah launa nei loin na om nak-uhleh tu-in Sarah’ tanute na hita uh hi." -‭‭ PETER MASA‬ ‭3:1-6‬‬

13. "amaute sangin a nauzaw nupite in a pasalte uh le a tate uh a it nadingun a hilh ding, "thu ngaihsun thei, a gamtat siangtho, inn nasep a kizen, a migi, le a pasalte uh thu a mang thei mi ahih nadingun na gen in."-‭‭TITUS‬ ‭2:4-5‬

14. "Zite aw, Khristiante gamtat dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah ngongtat kei un." -‭‭KOLOSE‬ ‭3:18-19‬‬

15. "Tua mah bangin pasalte in zong amau pumpi zah mah bangin a zite uh a it ding uh ahi hi. A zi a it mi pen amah a ki-it mi ahi hi." -‭‭EFESA‬ ‭5:28‬‬

title: II. Lungdam Kohna Tuamtuam
encoded:
Galhiam 355-358

Theisakna: Laisiangtho munte pen Galhiam Labu sung pan a ki la hi in, Laisiangtho version pen bible.com a Tedim Bible pan hi. Labu sung a a laimal tawh ki banglo thei ding a,ahih hang a khiatna a kibang mah hi.

1. "Lungdam kohna tawh ama kongpi-ah lut unla, amah phatna tawh ama huang sungah tum un. Ama tungah lungdam ko unla, ama min phat un."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭100:4‬‬

2. "Topa tungah lungdamna ko-in, ama min phat unla, ama sepnate khempeuh mite lakah kitheisak un."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭105:1‬‬

3. "Ahih hangin ke’n ahihleh lungdamna aw tawh biakna kong pia ding a, ka ciamsa thu ka tangtungsak ding hi. Topa’ kiang pan hotkhiatna hong pai hi,” a ci hi."-‭‭JONAH‬ ‭2:9‬‬

4."Topa sungah lungdam tawntung un, ka hong cihsa bangin tu-in zong lungdam un, ka hong ci kik hi. Mi khempeuh tungah na dik un. Topa hong pai baih ta ding hi. Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un."-‭‭FILIPPI‬ ‭4:4-6

5. "Lungdam tawntungin, thu ngen niloh unla, bangbang hong piang taleh na lungdamna uh Pasian tungah ko tawntung un. Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin na nuntakna sung uhah hih bangzia-in na om ding uh Pasian in a hong deih ahi hi."-‭‭ THESALONIKA MASA‬ ‭5:16-18

6."Pasian in nakpitakin amaute lungdamsak ahih manin amaute in tua ni-in biakpiakna lian tampi pia-in lungdam uh a, numei naupangte zong lungdam uh hi. Tua hi a, Jerusalem khuasunga lungdamna awging gamlapi pek pan nangawnin kiza hi." -‭‭NEHEMIAH‬ ‭12:43‬‬

7. "Topa aw, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh nangma tungah lungdamna kong ko a, pasian-te’ mai-ah nangmah phatna ka sa hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭138:1‬‬

8. "Galdo nadingin sakolte a baihsa-in kikoih a, ahi zongin galzawhna pen Topa’ hang hizaw hi."-‭‭PAUNAK‬ ‭21:31‬‬

9. "Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a, haksat hunin a hong huh pahpah pa ahi hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭46:1‬‬

10. "Na lungsim khempeuh tawh Topa muang inla, nang’ theihna suang kei in. Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hileh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi."-‭‭PAUNAK‬ ‭3:5-6‬‬

11. "Biakpiak nadingin lungdam piakna hong paipih mi in kei a hong pahtawi ahi hi. Ka thu a mang mite khempeuh ka honkhia ding hi,” a ci hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭50:23‬‬

12. "Biakpiak nadingin lungdam piakna hong paipih mi in kei a hong pahtawi ahi hi. Ka thu a mang mite khempeuh ka honkhia ding hi,” a ci hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭50:23‬‬

13. "Topa tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭37:5‬‬

14. "Topa, ka khuavak le hong honpa ahi hi. Kua kihta ding ka hi hiam? Topa, kei a dingin munmuanhuai ahi hi. Bang laupih ding ka hi hiam?"-‭‭LATE‬ ‭27:1‬‬

15. "Keimah in mualtung lam ka ento hi. Keimah huhna koi lai pan hong pai ding ahi hiam? Van le lei a bawl Topa’ kiang panin keimah huhna hong pai hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭121:1-2

16. "Topa a muang mite pen ling hetloin a om tawntung Zion Mual tawh kibang hi. Jerusalem kimkotah mualte a om mah bangin ama mite’ kimkotah tua kipan a tawntungin Topa om ding hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭125:1-2‬‬

17. "Ka cihmawh ciangin Topa’ tungah ka kiko a, amah in hong dawng hi." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭120:1‬‬

18. "Topa pen tuucin bangin hong cing hi a, kisapna teng kicing ta hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭23:1‬‬

19. "Topa ka phat ding a, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh ama min siangtho ka phat ding hi. Topa ka phat ding a, ama migitna ka mangngilh kei ding hi."Amah in ka mawhna khempeuh hong maisak a, ka natna khempeuh hong damsak hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭103:1-3‬‬

20. "En in, Pasian pen kei a hong honkhia pa ahi hi. Amah ka muang ding a, ka lau kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian in thahatna le vangliatna hong pia a, amah pen kei a hong honkhia pa ahi hi,” a cih hun uh hong tung ding hi." -‭‭ISAIAH‬ ‭12:2‬‬

21. "Tawntung Pasian pen nangma omna hi a, nangmah huh dingin tawntung khutte a om hi. Amah in na mai-ah galte nawtkhia-in, ‘Susia un,’ ci hi." -‭‭THU HILHKIKNA‬ ‭33:27‬‬

22. "A honkhia zo lo dingin Topa zawngkhal lo a, khua a za thei lo dingin a bil ngong lo hi."-‭‭ISAIAH‬ ‭59:1‬‬

23. "Kei tunga ama thupha tampite Topa’ tungah bangci thuk ding ka hi hiam?" -‭‭LATE‬ ‭116:12‬‬

24. "Topa aw, kote tungah maavanna hong pia in. Kote’ matut zawhna khempeuh nangmah in na hong sepsakna hang ahi hi." -‭‭ISAIAH‬ ‭26:12‬‬

25. "Ahi zongin Topa in kei kiangah, “Na tha a nem ciangin keima vangliatna hat mahmah ahih manin nangma kisapna pen keima hehpihna hi bek hi,” ci-in hong dawng hi. Tua ahih manin keima sungah Khrih vangliatna hong omtheih nadingin lungdam takin ka thaneemna ka kisialhpih semsem hi." -‭‭ KORIN NIHNA‬ ‭12:9‬‬

26. "Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “ Topa in Zerubbabel tungah hih bangin thu gen hi: Galkap tam neihna hang hi lo, nangma vangliatna hang zong hi lo, keima tung panin na ngah vangliatna bek tawh na ma na tunzo ding hi." -‭‭ZEKHARIAH‬ ‭4:6‬‬

27. "Hih teng bang ahih khit ciangin bang gen ding om nawn ahi hiam? Pasian in eite hong koppih peuh leh kua in eite hong zozo ding ahi hiam?" -‭‭ROM‬ ‭8:31‬‬

28. "Pasian in note hong kem ahih manin na lungkhamnate khempeuh uh ama kiang tunpih un." -‭‭1 PETER MASA‬ ‭5:7‬‬

29. "Amaute in inn lam ding uh a, a sungah teng ding uh hi. Amaute in leenggui lo bawl ding uh a, a gah ne ding uh hi." -‭‭ISAIAH‬ ‭65:21‬‬

30. "Topa aw, David na ngaihsutna-in a gim thuaknate khempeuh le amah in, “Jakob’ Vanglianpa’ tenna ding, Topa a’ ding mun ka muh matengin ka inn sungah ka lum kei ding a, ka lupna ka zuan kei ding hi. Ka ihmu kei ding a, ka mitkhute ka kikhupsak kei ding hi,” ci-in Jakob’ Vanglianpa’ tungah hong thuciamna le Topa’ tungah hong kiciamnate phawk in." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭132:4‬‬

31. "“Jerusalem panin Babylon-ah a hong kipuakkhia saltang mi khempeuhte’ tungah Vanglian Topa, Pasian in hih bangin hong ci hi:"-‭‭JEREMIAH‬ ‭29:4‬‬

32. "“Tua ciangin uliante in mite kiangah thu genin, ‘Inn thak lam khinin a ap nai lo kua om na hi uh hiam? Gal sungah amah si-in midang khat in a inn ap kha ding ahih manin a inn-ah ciahkik hen." -‭‭THU HILHKIKNA‬ ‭20:5‬‬

33. "Topa in inn lampih kei leh innlamte’ sepna a mawkna ahi hi. Topa in khuapi hutpih kei leh khuapi cingte’ cinna a mawkna ahi hi." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭127:1

34. "Topa in tua kipan a tawntungin na vaksuk na vaktohna-ah nang hong kem ding hi." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭121:8‬‬

35. "Ka lungsim le ka pumpi zawngkhal kha ding a, ahih hangin Pasian pen ka lungsim hatna le keima a’ hi tawntung ding hi." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭73:26‬‬

title: I. Sihna Leh Hehnepna
encoded:
Galhiam 349 - 358

Theisakna:Laisiangtho munte pen Galhiam Labu sung pan a ki la hi in, Laisiangtho version pen bible.com a Tedim Bible pan hi. Labu sung a a laimal tawh ki banglo thei ding a,ahih hang a khiatna a kibang mah hi.
1. "A hun ciangin ancilna phualah buhlom a tun mah bangin a teek sihin han na zuan ding hi." -‭‭JOB‬ ‭5:26‬‬

2. "Lei-ah na ciahkik matengin khua-ul kai-in na na sep ciang bekin an na ne ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lei sung panin nang hong kipiangsak a, nang, leivui na hih manin, leivui mah na suakkik ding hi,” a ci hi."-‭‭PIANCILNA‬ ‭3:19

3. "Ahih hangin tu-in amah si ta hi; bang hangin an tang nawn ding ka hi hiam? Amah lakik thei ding ka hi hiam? Ama kiangah kei ka pai ding a, ahih hangin kei kiangah amah hong kik lo ding hi," SAMUAL NIHNA 12:23

4."A husanna a bei ciangin lei-ah ciahkik uh a, tua ni mahmahin a ngaihsutnate uh beita hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭146:4‬‬

5. "Suah hun om a, sih hun om hi. Suan hun om a, bawhkhiat hun om hi. Gawh hun om a, khoi hun om hi. Phel hun om a, lam hun om hi. Kah hun om a, nuih hun om hi. Dah hun om a, laam hun om hi." -‭‭THUHILHNA‬ ‭3:2-4‬‬

6. "A manpha paknamtui sangin minpha hoihzaw a, i suah ni sangin i sih ni hoihzaw hi.Pawisimna sangin sigalna hoihzaw hi. Sih ding bek a ngak ahihna mihing khempeuh in a phawk ding uh kilawm hi."-‭‭THUHILHNA‬ ‭7:1-2‬‬

7. "A sih ding a pelhthei, a sih ding hun a phiatthei kuamah om lo hi. Gal a om ciangin gallauna a pelhthei, siatna sungah a lut ciangin a pengthei kuamah om lo hi."-‭‭THUHILHNA‬ ‭8:8

8. "Mihing in ama hun ding thei ngei lo hi. Thangah a awk vasate le ngen-ah a awk ngasate tawh i kibang hi. Lamet loh hun laitak keekin hunsia sungah mihingte i tung hi." -‭‭THUHILHNA‬ ‭9:12‬‬

9. "I pumpi, lei suakkik ding a, i nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ kiangah i kha ciahkik ta ding hi."-‭‭THUHILHNA‬ ‭12:7‬‬

10. "Tua tuite in leitung a tuamkik loh nadingin amaute’ kantan loh ding gamgi khat na phut hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭104:9‬‬

11. "Bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin Pasian’ hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna ahi hi." -‭‭ROM‬ ‭6:23‬‬

12. "A muatthei pen a muat thei lo hong suakin, a sithei pen a sithei lo hong suah ciangin Lai Siangtho thu hong tung taktak ding hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Sihna maimangin gualzawhna in khuplet hi." -‭‭ KORIN MASA‬ ‭15:54‬‬

13. "Sanggamte aw, lametna a nei lo mite bangin na dahluat loh nadingun a sisa mite’ omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi. Jesuh si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Jesuh hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi."-‭‭ THESALONIKA MASA‬ ‭4:13-14

14. "A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uh hi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna le minsiatna a ngah ding uh hi."-‭‭DANIEL‬ ‭12:2‬‬

15. "Natna in ka vun a nektum khit hangin, hih ka pumpi mahmah tawh Pasian ka mu ding hi. Keima mit teekteek tawh amah ka mu ding a, amah in kei hong khualmi et lo ding hi. -‭‭JOB‬ ‭19:26-27‬‬

16. "Kei ka hih leh, thumanna tawh na maitang ka en ding a, ka khanlawh ciangin nangma mel muhna tawh ka lungkim ding hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭17:15‬‬

17. "Nangma mi a sisate hingkik ding uh a, amau’ pumpi thokik ding hi. Han sungah a lum mite aw, tho-in lungdamin la sa un! Bang hang hiam cih leh zing daitui in leitung a nosakkik bangin sawtpi-a a sisa mite Topa in hingkiksak ding hi." -‭‭ISAIAH‬ ‭26:19‬‬

18."Amaute in zong dangka peek khat hong paipih uh a, tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Hih dangka tunga om kua’ lim hi a, kua’ min ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Rom Kumpipa Sisar’ lim le a min ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi." -‭‭MARKA‬ ‭12:16‬‬  

19. "Hih thu ka hong gen ciangin lamdangsa kei un. Han sungah a om misi khempeuh in ama aw za-in, han sung panin a hong paikhiat uh hun hong tung ding hi. A gamtat hoih mite pen a nungta tawntung dingin hong thokik ding uh a, a gamtat siate ahihleh mawhsak thukhenna a thuak dingin hong thokik ding uh hi." -‭‭JOHAN‬ ‭5:28-29‬‬

20. "Amaute’ up le lamet mah bangin, Pasian in miphate le misiate a kibangin sihna panin hingkiksak khawm ding hi, ci-in umin ka lamen hi." -‭‭SAWLTAK‬ ‭24:15

21. "Peengkul nunung hong gin’ ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikhelpak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh peengkul hong gin’ ciangin misite a sithei nawn lo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi." -‭‭ KORIN MASA‬ ‭15:52‬‬

22. "Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keimah in a sisa mite thosakin a hingsak thei pa ka hi hi. Kei hong um mi peuhmah a sih hangin nungta ding hi." -‭‭JOHAN‬ ‭11:25‬‬

23. "Amah in sihna beimangsak ding a, maitang khempeuh panin khitui nul ding hi. Leitung khempeuh panin ama mite a kizahkona lakhia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih thu gen khinzo hi." -‭‭ISAIAH‬ ‭25:8‬‬

24. "Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Note lunghimawh kei un. Pasian um unla, kei zong hong um un. Note’ om nading mun a bawlkhol dingin a pai ding ka hi hi. Ka Pa’ inn sungah om nading mun tampi om hi. A om lo ding hileh hih bangin thu ka hong gen kei ding hi. Kei va pai-in note’ om nading mun ka va bawlkholh khit ciangin keima omna munah note na hong om theih nadingun note a hong la dingin ka hong paikik ding hi." -‭‭JOHAN‬ ‭14:1-3‬‬

25. "Bang hang hiam cih leh hih ka tenna ka leitung pumpi uh a sih ciangin mihingte bawl ahi lo, Pasian in a kip tawntung dingin kote a dingin a hong bawlsak inn, vantungah a nei ding ka hihna uh ka thei uh hi."-‭‭ KORIN NIHNA‬ ‭5:1‬‬

26. "Eite a dingin hih leitungah a kip khuapi om lo ahih manin a hong piang lai ding khuapi a zong ihi hi." -‭‭HEBRU‬ ‭13:14‬‬

27. "Ama mi siangthote a sih ciangin Topa in na sa mahmah hi." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭116:15‬‬

28. "Faro in Jakob kiangah, “Na nuntak kum bangzah pha ta ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Jakob in Faro kiangah, “Tawlkhat sung ka nuntak hun pen kum za le kum sawmthum ahi hi. Ka nuntak hun tom sungah siatna bekbek om a, ka pate tawlkhat a omsung uh a nuntak hunte ban nai lo hi,” a ci hi."-‭‭PIANCILNA‬ ‭47:8-9‬‬

29. "Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna a thuak ding ahih mah bangin, mi tampite’ mawhna a thuak dingin Khrih zong khatvei bek a kipia hi. A nihveina hong kilatkik ciangin mawhna thu tawh kisai nasem ding hi nawn loin, lawptakin amah a ngak mite a honkhia ding ahi hi." -‭‭HEBRU‬ ‭9:27-28‬‬

30. "Amah in a gim mi tungah vangliatna pia a, thahatna a nei lo mi a thahatna khangsak hi. Khangnote nangawn gimin tawl ding a, khanglai mite a tha uh bei ding hi. Ahih hangin Topa a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawl lo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gim lo ding uh hi." -‭‭ISAIAH‬ ‭40:29-31‬‬

31. "Kote’ nuntak sung kum sawmsagih bang hi a, cidam le-ung kum sawmgiat bang hithei hi. Ahih hangin tua hunsung nangawn gimna le haksatna hi a, tua hunte bei pakin kote ka maimang uh hi. Nang hong kizahtak nadingin na sinsona’ vangliatna kua in thei a, na hehna’ husiatna kua in thei ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin pilna lungsim ka ngah theih nadingun ka nuntak hun uh a tomlam ka theih nadingun hong hilh in." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭90:10-12‬‬

32. "Tua ciangin vantung panin awging khat ka za a, “Tu a kipanin Topa thu-ah a si mite mi hampha mahmah ahi hi, cihna gelh in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Kha Siangtho in, “Hi takpi hi. Amaute’ nasepna thaman in amaute zui ding ahih manin a nasep gimna panun tawlnga-in nuamsa-in om ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi." -‭‭MAANGMUHNA‬ ‭14:13‬‬

33. "Topa aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum le na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭23:4‬‬

34. "Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka nu sung panin guaktangin ka suak a, guaktang mahin ka ciahkik ding hi. Topa in hong pia a, Topa mah in hong lakik hi. Topa’ min kiphat ta hen,” a ci hi." -‭‭JOB‬ ‭1:21‬‬

35. "A nuntak tan ding kisehkhol a, a nuntak kha phazah ding kiciangtan khin hi. Nangmah in na ciangtan khin a, kikheel thei nawn lo hi." -‭‭JOB‬ ‭14:5‬‬

36. "“ Topa aw, ka mong le ka hun a kisehzah hong theisak inla, ka nuntakna a beipak hun ding hong theisak in!” ka ci hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭39:4‬‬

37. "Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite a dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi." -‭‭ROM‬ ‭8:28‬‬

38. "Topa hoih hi; lungkham hunin a mite huh a, amah a beel mite limtakin a kem hi."-‭‭NAHUM‬ ‭1:7‬‬

39. "Ama hehna tomno sung bek hi a, ama hong deihsakna pen khang tawntung ading ahi hi. Zan hun sungteng kahna omkha mah ding a, ahih hangin zing khuavak tawh nuamna hong tung hi." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭30:5‬‬

40. "Dahin a thum a tau mite Pasian in amaute hehnem ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi." -‭‭MATTHAI‬ ‭5:4‬‬

41. "Ka lawm itte aw, eite’ pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nai loh hangin tu-in Pasian’ tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i bat nading thu teltakin i thei hi." -‭‭ JOHAN MASA‬ ‭3:2‬‬

"Dal limlang sunga et bangin tu laitakin a kitel pha loin i mu milmial a, ahi zongin mai lamah maitang kituahin i mu ding hi. Tu laitakin i theihnate kicing lo a, ahi zongin mai lamah Pasian in eite hong theih mah bangin a kicing takin amah i thei ding hi."-‭‭ KORIN MASA‬ ‭13:12‬‬

42. "Han khuk, taciing numei, tui a deih tawntung lei keu, le a kisumit zo lo meikuang."-‭‭PAUNAK‬ ‭30:16‬‬

43. "Topa lamenin ka ngak ngiungeu a, amah kei lam hong nga-in ka kikona aw hong za hi." -‭‭LATE‬ ‭40:1

44. "A bei thei lo Topa’ hong itna le a hehpihna a kizom paisuak hi a, zing nisuak bangin thaksuak tawntung a, ni a hong suah pelmawh mah tawh a kibang ahi hi."-‭‭KAH LA‬ ‭3:22-23‬‬

45. "Amah ka muh ciangin misi bangin ama khe phungah ka puk hi. Ahi zongin amah in ka tungah a taklam khut hong nga a, “Lau kei in; kei pen a kipatna le a tawpna ka hi a, a nungta mipa zong ka hi hi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hi hi. Sihna le misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uh hi."-‭‭MAANGMUHNA‬ ‭1:17-18‬‬

46. "Pa nei lote’ pa le meigong numeite a hupa pen, a siangtho mahmah ama omna-ah a om Pasian ahi hi. -‭‭LATE‬ ‭68:5‬‬

47."Na tuah uh ze-etnate khempeuh pen mite’ tuah ngeingeite mah ahi hi. Pasian in citakin a thuciamna lenkip ahih manin note’ thuak zawh loh ding ze-etna hong tuaksak lo ding hi. Ze-etna na tuah hun uh ciangin zong na thuakzawh nading uh thahatna hong guan ding ahih manin na suahtak zawh nading uh lampi hong honsak ding hi."-‭‭ KORIN MASA‬ ‭10:13‬‬

48. "Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih a’ ding bekin a nungta ka hi a, si taleng zong kei a dingin hoihzaw semsem lai hi."-‭‭FILIPPI‬ ‭1:21‬‬

49. "Tuhuna i thuaknate pen Pasian in a hong piak ding minthanna tawh ka ngaihsut khawm ciangin gentham ka sa het kei hi." -‭‭ROM‬ ‭8:18‬‬

50. "Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in eite’ pianna hong thei a, eite pen leivui ihihna a phawk hi."-‭‭LATE‬ ‭103:14‬‬

title: Mi Nuamsa
encoded:
Galhiam 6


Mi nuamsa in mi nuam sa in,
Sun leh zan in Topa thu lungngai mi hi
A nopsakna in Topa thu sung bek hi,
A tawntungin Topa tungah lungdam hi.

Gunngei a kisuan singkung bang hi a,
A teh vullo, a gah hunin gah den a,
A sepna peuh ah, tangtungin nuamsa hi,
Sun leh zan in a thu ngai leng nuam ka sa.

Ih Topa hoih hi, ih Topa hoih hi,

Gual zote tung’h gualzo pente ih hi hi.
